item.title: log4j2_rce复现
item.description: 拉取本地环境运行， docker pull vulfocus/log4j2-rce-2021-12-09:latest docker run -d -P vulfocus/log4j2-rce-2021-12-09:latest 1.首先在vps用JNDI-Injection-Exploit-1.0-SNAPSHOT-all.jar启
